item.text: First hangout is happens 5 days after the event.
First hangout is happens 5 days after the event.
How many people turn up? 6 is a limit. Lets say 6 turn up.
What happens? What are we showing?

First hangout is happens 5 days after the event. Everyone is invited (by email, on slack and a FB group?) to join. It also happens in physical location where? Dave's flat? Should be somewhere quiet and with good internet.
